::Spears::
She stopped yelling and cried softly.  Tears ran down her cheeks in 
buckets. Her face showed fear and terror. She said in a normal voice, 
just in case the others could hear her,"Please don't kill me, please."
She held still, but cried softly. 

SnowCat::
her whole body tensed as she watched what was happeneing to Spears.  
She hated to see a fellow maximal being used as bait.  She stood 
perfectly still with her cloaking devise on and watched and waited.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream got an evil grin on his face.
> 
> "Thank You. It's time for them to pay." He stood infront of Inferno.
> 
> "Tell Megatron that we are no longer his subjects and soldiers. His 
> days on this planet are numbered, as the Alliance has been aroused 
to 
> his treachery. He is the most hunted man on the planet, and he will 
> fall!" Starscream fired off two shots from each of his guns.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Gotron
> 
> Gotron ran after Wheeljack.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Prebon
> 
> Prebon stopped suddenly. He thought he heard some movement in the 
> bushes, but it was probabl just an animal. Better to be safe than 
> sorry, though.... He hoped Spears would get the message about not 
> talking to him about their plans any more.
> 
> "BE QUIET! Your friends will be here soon, and I won't be able to  
> discuss the exchange. NO MORE TALKING! About anything!"
